linkbase.sig: {šu-a ra-ah = šu[hand]N rah[beat]V/t += šu rah[beat//to beat]V/t'V/t}::@dcclt%sux:šu-a=šu[hand//hand]N'N$šu,ak/šu#~,ak++@dcclt%sux:ra-ah=rah[beat//to beat, kill]V/t'V/t$rah/ra-ah#~

{gu₃ de₂-de₂ = gu[voice]N de[pour]V/t += gu de[say//to say (addressing someone),]V/t'V/t}::@dcclt%sux:gu₃=gu[voice//voice, cry, noise]N'N$gu/gu₃#~++@dcclt%sux:de₂-de₂=de[pour//to pour]V/t'V/t$de/de₂-de₂#~
